video.title: Saint Seiya: The Hades Chapter
video.synopsis: In the wake of the Saints' battle with Poseidon, Hades, the god of the underworld, rises again with plans to kill Athena and rule the world.

episodes.synopsis: The old master has a vision in which Hades decapitates Athena. He realizes that the end will come when Hades and his 108 Specters return to Earth.
episodes.title: The Start of a New Holy War

episodes.synopsis: Aphrodite and Death Mask see Seiya's body is gone, but the third Saint doubts Mu killed Pegasus. The Arian is furious with Cancer and Pisces.
episodes.title: The Three of the Lament

episodes.synopsis: The spectre Radamanthys of Wyvern meets his love Pandora, and disobeying her, he sends more than 10 specters to fight at the 12 houses.
episodes.title: The Shadow of the One Who Struggles

episodes.synopsis: Saga tells Shura and Camus to continue, as he will take care of Gemini. Milo of Scorpio finds himself with Kanon of Gemini and orders him to leave.
episodes.title: Expiation of the Immortal

episodes.synopsis: Saga, Shura and Camus find that the interior of the house of Cancer has become a gateway to the world of the dead but then realize it's an illusion.
episodes.title: Transient Meeting

episodes.synopsis: Dohko and Shion begin to fight, but the knight of Libra is overpowered because of his age and the youth of Shion granted by Hades.
episodes.title: The Ancient Warrior

episodes.synopsis: Mu reaches the remains of the house of Cancer and is immobilized by a large group led by Spectrum Giganto of Cyclops and Papillon Myu.
episodes.title: The Herd of Black Cloaks

episodes.synopsis: Seiya falls exhausted and waking up meets Shiryu, Hyoga and Shun. Meanwhile, led by Giganto, the Spectras arrive at the house of Leo, meeting Aioria.
episodes.title: The Moment of Vacillation

episodes.synopsis: Giganto is furious when he learns that Saga and the others killed three specters to impersonate them against Shaka.
episodes.title: At the End of Restraint

episodes.synopsis: Everyone in the Sanctuary can feel Shaka of Virgo is dead, but three knights are surprised when they discover Shaka is still in the garden.
episodes.title: The Golden Clash

episodes.synopsis: Shion and Dohko are still alive, and the previous Patriarch cries over the deaths of Aldebaran, Death Mask and Aphrodite.
episodes.title: Shaking Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: As Shion mourns in front of Athena's blood spilled on the floor, she is able to wake the armor of Athena.
episodes.title: The Cloth of Athena

episodes.synopsis: The Bronze Saints want to fight against Radamanthys, but the Golden Knights send them to assist Saga and the others.
episodes.title: The Morning of the Resolution

episodes.synopsis: Saint of Libra tells Shiryu, Shun, Hyoga and Dohko they must now awaken their Eighth Sense to enter the world of the dead without getting killed.
episodes.title: Cross Over! Acheron River

episodes.synopsis: At the courthouse, a soldier tells Seiya and Shun to keep silence until they are in front of his master Lune, where they must tell all their sins.
episodes.title: The Tribunal of Silence

episodes.synopsis: Seiya and Shun leave the Valley of Air and encounter an Egyptian building, where they discover a three-headed monster that is eating the dead.
episodes.title: Legendary Saint Orphee

episodes.synopsis: Orpheus plays the strings of his lyre and Pharaoh loses control of his hand and drops the armor of Athena, which Seiya collects.
episodes.title: Orphee, The Sad Requiem

episodes.synopsis: Pandora tells Radamanthys that in no way should they bother telling Hades everything that happens in the world of the dead.
episodes.title: Hades! A Surprising Possession

episodes.synopsis: To reach Kanon, Hyoga and Shiryu run down the Fifth Prison, the place for those who did not have the protective teachings of a god, atheists.
episodes.title: Violent Battle! The Road to Giudecca

episodes.synopsis: Garuda gets up and hits Ikki, and to end it, he decides to use his most powerful technique: galactic illusion.
episodes.title: God's Punishment! Greatest Eclipse

episodes.synopsis: Shun tells his brother to kill Hades no matter what. Pandora cannot believe that the body of Shun rebels against Hades' power.
episodes.title: Ikki! Sorrowful Punch

episodes.synopsis: In Cociytos, Seiya does not let go of Athena's armor as he is hit by Valentine, who realizes he must take the armor to her so she can defeat Hades.
episodes.title: Athena! Offer your Life

episodes.synopsis: Seiya is unconscious in Cocytos but is animated by Marin from his unconsciousness and is encouraged to proceed to Athena.
episodes.title: Desperation! The Wailing Wall

episodes.synopsis: The five Golden Knights ignite their cosmos to tackle the Wailing Wall but fail, and the wall returns everything they threw at it back to them.
episodes.title: Reunion! The Gold Cloths

episodes.synopsis: The 12 Gold Saints are reunited, ready to sacrifice their lives to allow Seiya and the other Bronze Saints to reach the Elysion.
episodes.title: Farewell! Gold Saints!

episodes.synopsis: After a difficult battle in the world of the dead, ruled by the god Hades, the Golden Knights are revived by the cosmos of Athena to fight in unison.
episodes.title: The Deadly Battle to Elysion

episodes.synopsis: It's Ikki's turn to reach the Super Dimension. Pandora gives him a bracelet to cross Elysion and the Underworld.
episodes.title: Gods of Death and Sleep

episodes.synopsis: In the Sanctuary, Marin tells the Bronze Saint Shaina that this girl is Seika, Seiya's sister, but that Seika does not remember who she is.
episodes.title: Gold Reinforcements

episodes.synopsis: Thanatos does not understand how it is possible, as Poseidon had been locked in Athena's vase and had returned to his eternal slumber.
episodes.title: Legendary God Cloths

episodes.synopsis: Seiya is running desperately to the vessel containing Athena and is stopped by Hypnos. Seiya warns him that he will defeat him.
episodes.title: Awakening from Myth

episodes.synopsis: In a desperate attempt to rescue Saori, Seiya and Ikki see for the first the true form of Hades; they try to attack Hades but are severely hit by him.
episodes.title: To the World Where Light Overflows
